abstract: United States defeats Canada, 4-2, in Group A round-robin game in world junior hockey championship.
lead_paragraph: Louis Belpedio and Auston Matthews scored in a 41-second span late in the third period to give the United States a 4-2 victory over Canada in Helsinki in their first round-robin game in the world junior hockey championship.
snippet: Louis Belpedio and Auston Matthews scored in a 41-second span late in the third period to give the United States a 4-2 victory over Canada in Helsinki in their first round-robin game in the world junior hockey championship.
